name: Flying Hoops!
description:
It's a... flying.. basketball?

Tap the screen to bounce your ball and jump it through the hoops!
It may sound like a simple game, but you'll need all your flappy skills to set the high score.

- Tap once, bounce once, tap twice, jump higher!
This flappy ball is all over the place, but once you learn its physics you can make a slam dunk in no time.

- Get unique skills and reach the higher score!
There are unique skills and it'll make your flappy ball flying more.
Want to find it? You'll have to play like a pro! Dribble your basketball when you get into fever mode and soar through the high scores!

- Endless fun and infinite challenge!
How far can you go in this free tapping and dunking game? With infinite game play and endless challenge, you can keep tapping and flying forever!

- Most addicting of all free tapping games!
Whether you're a pro or new to tappy games, the simple controls and addictive game play will keep you coming back for more!



Enjoy infinite casual fun in this deceptively simple and addictive flappy basketball game.
- Get ready to make a flappy dunk with Flying Hoops!
